PF1.Title: Pathfinder 1e

LevelUp.SkipHint: Add class level as is, ignoring choices in this dialog. Class associations and other basic improvements (such as BAB) are still added.

Auto.Label: Auto
Auto.Desc: Your hit points are set automatically according to predefined rate ({rate}%).

Static.Label: Static
Static.Desc: You gain set amount of HP defined by your class.

Maximized.Label: Maximized
Maximized.Desc: You gain maximum possible HP for this level based on your hit die.

Roll.Label: Roll
Roll.Desc: Your hit points for this level will be rolled based on your hit die.

Manual.Label: Manual
Manual.Desc: You will decide how many hit points you gain for this level.

HP.Label: Hit Point
HP.Desc: You gain a single hit point.

Skill.Label: Skill Point
Skill.Desc: You gain a single skill rank to freely spend.

Alt.Label: Alternate
Alt.Desc: You gain something specific for your class and race combination.

None.Label: None
None.Desc: You gain nothing either because this class can not have FCB or you have not chosen a bonus.

Item.Name: Added Ability Scores
Item.Desc: This feature is used for tracking your ability score changes from gaining hit die.

Extra.NewFeat: You have 1 new feat to choose
Extra.NewFeats: You have {newValue} new feats to choose

PF1.DeleteItemConfirmation: Вы уверены, что хотите удалить предмет?
PF1.DeleteActionConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this action from {name}?
PF1.DeleteChildLinks: Following item(s) will also be deleted due to child links or other associations
PF1.DeleteSkillConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this skill?
PF1.LinkHelpChildren: Linked children are deleted from the actor when the link parent (this item) is deleted.
PF1.LinkHelpCharges: Linked items inherit and share the charges from the link parent (this item).
PF1.LinkHelpClassAssociations: Class association linked items are automatically added to the actor at the appropriate class level. Unlike other item links, these must be linked from a compendium.
PF1.LinkHelpSupplements: Supplemental items are added alongside this item when added to an actor.
PF1.HelpSellMultiplier: Коэффициент продажи неторговых предметов. Товары всегда продают по полной цене. По умолчанию 0,5.
PF1.TotalItemValue: Total Item Value: {gp} gp, {sp} sp, {cp} cp

Progression.Label: Progression
Progression.Hint:
High goes up to level 9.
Medium goes up to level 6.
Low goes up to level 4.

AutoSpellClassLevelOffset.InfoBox: If you have a prestige class that alters your class level, add that here (e.g. @classes.mysticTheurge.level)

PF1.FilterBooleanOperatorHint: Switch between requiring an item to match all filters, or any single one.

Error.NoActorPermission: You are not authorized to control this actor
Error.NoActorPermissionAlt: You are not authorized to control actor "{name}"
Error.NoItemPermission: You are not authorized to modify this item.
Error.DisallowedActionType: Actor "{name}" is not permitted to perform this kind of action.
Error.TooManyConditionSources: Too many condition sources to edit.
Error.NoDefenseCard: Failed to display defense card. Actor does not support it?
Error.NoSave: Failed to roll saving throw. Actor does not support it?
Error.UUIDNotFound: UUID "{uuid}" did not resolve to anything relevant.
Error.NoInitOnDuplicateCombatant: Could not determine which combatant to roll initiative for.
Error.InvalidContentLinkDrop: Could not create content link from drop data.
Error.NoGiftTargets: No valid targets to give something to.
Error.InsufficientPreparation: {name} has not been prepared or is not known.
Error.NoQuantity: You don't have any more of that item
Error.CantIdentify: You are not allowed to identify items
Error.NoMacroID: No macro with id '{id}' was found

Warning.NoSizeDie: Could not determine size-appropriate die for {formula}, defaulting to rolling {fallback}
Warning.DuplicateDFlag: Conflicting dictionary flag "{key}" for item "{item}" (with identifier "{tag}") on actor "{actor}".
Warning.DuplicateTag: Duplicate item identifier "{tag}" found in item "{item}" on actor "{actor}".
Warning.NoDiceAllowedInFormula: No dice rolls are allowed in formula '{formula}' for {context}
Warning.ConditionalRoll: Rolling conditional formula № {number} of conditional {name} caused an error
Warning.CannotCreateChargeLink: Could not make {target} inherit Charges from {source}, because {target} is sharing its charges already.
Warning.CannotCreateChargeLink2: Could not make {target} inherit Charges from {source}, because {target} is already inheriting from {deeptarget}
Warning.LinkOwnerMismatch: Can not create link on item with different owner.
Warning.LinkOnlyCompendium: Can not link items outside of compendiums.
Warning.NoActorSelected: No actor(s) selected for the action.
Warning.NoMultiLink: Can not link same item multiple times.
Warning.FormulaMustBeDeterministic: Formula must be deterministic (no die rolls or other random elements).
Warning.FormulaMustBeSimple: Formula must be simple (no variables, dice rolls or other non-math elements).

PF1.Info_FirstClass:
Drag and drop from {browser}
or click the {create} button above to start from scratch.
PF1.Info_MissingClass: Your character is missing a class. Go to the Classes section on the Summary tab of your character sheet.
PF1.FootnotesHint: Notes printed at the bottom of a chat card only.
PF1.EffectNotesHint: Notes printed for each instance, e.g. for each individual attack about the effects of it.
PF1.SkillJournalHint: Drag & drop journal or journal page here to link it.
PF1.FullRestMessage: {name} rested for {hours} hours and restored daily uses.

Use.Name: Use
Use.Info: Called when the item has been 'used' (attack, drink potion, etc.). Has the extra array variable attacks, which contains the action's attack rolls, if any.

PostUse.Name: Post-Use
PostUse.Info: Called after the item has been 'used' and all relevant processing by the system has finished.

Equip.Name: Equip
Equip.Info: Called when the item has been equipped or unequipped. Has the extra boolean variable equipped.

Implant.Name: Implant
Implant.Info: Called when the item has been implanted or unimplanted. Has the extra boolean variable implanted.

Toggle.Name: Toggle
Toggle.Info: Called when the item has been enabled or disabled. Has the extra boolean variable state.

ChangeQuantity.Name: Change Quantity
ChangeQuantity.Info: Called when the quantity of the item has been changed. Has the extra numeric variables quantity.previous and quantity.new.

ChangeLevel.Name: Change Level
ChangeLevel.Info: Called when the level of the item has been changed. Has the extra numeric variables level.previous and level.new.

PF1.AbundantDesc: Never remove this ammunition when used.
PF1.RequiresAutoSlots: Requires auto spell slots to be enabled.
PF1.AutoSlotIncompatible: Requires auto spell slots to be disabled.
PF1.InvalidSpellLevelHint:
Invalid Spell Level
Displayed only because of spells assigned to it.

ExtraAttacks.Label: Extra Attacks
ExtraAttacks.ModifierTooltip: @formulaicAttack can be used to refer how manyth attack in sequence this is.

PF1.Name: Имя
PF1.MaxAbilityHint: Maximum ability score modifier allowed. Limit applied before multiplier. Unlimited if undefined.
PF1.ToggleSkillLock: Toggle edit lock on rarely needed parts of the skill list.
PF1.TemplateSizeFormulaHint: Defines cone's & ray's distance, circle's radius, and rectangle's side.
PF1.QuickbarHint: Display in token HUD and in summary quick actions.
PF1.QuickCombatHint: Include this item also in combat tab.
PF1.ChargeCostItemFormulaHint: How many charges (or casts, spell points, etc.) this item consumes by default. Negative values will restore charges instead.
PF1.ChargeCostActionFormulaHint: How many charges (or casts, spell points, etc.) this action consumes. Negative values will restore charges instead.
PF1.RechargeFormulaHint: Recharging sets the current charges to result of the formula. For relative recharging, use the current charge value @item.uses.value as part of the formula.
PF1.SpellsTotalEachDay: Общее количество заклинаний на каждый день (исключая дополнительные заклинания, такие как заклинания сфер и школ)
PF1.AutoBroken: Automatically broken due to remaining health.

BaseTypes.Label: Equipment Base Types
BaseTypes.Description:
For features that function on specific type such as Weapon Focus or specific weapon proficiency (such as exotic weapon proficiency), or when the item's name deviates from its base.

For example, the Fate Blade has base type of Dagger.

PF1.StaticSizeHint: If enabled, token dimensions and scale are not automatically adjusted to match character size.

CustomVisionRules.Label: Disable System Controlled Vision
CustomVisionRules.Description: Prevent system from controlling vision, allowing you to customize it.
CustomVisionRules.ConfigHint: System controlled senses are configured on actor sheet's attributes tab.
CustomVisionRules.Warning: This configuration has no effect while system controlled vision is disabled either globally or in token. Please disable both if you wish to continue using this.

PF1.DomainSlotValueDesc: Number of bonus spell slots Domain/School spells have for each spell level.

Migration.Start: Applying PF1 System Migration for version {version}. Please stand by.
Migration.InProgress: PF1 System Migration is in progress. Please wait for it to finish.
Migration.End: PF1 System Migration to version {version} completed!

Dialog.Title: Migration
Dialog.ErrorHelp: Click on the category error counters to see details.

ContentSource.Title: Content Sources: {name}
ContentSource.DelEntryDesc: Are you sure you want to delete "{entry}"?

Errors.DuplicateID: Source entry with same ID already exists.

Info.Title: Title
Info.TitleHint: Title of the source material, usually book name.
Info.IDHint: Book ID or similar, e.g. PZO1110

Damage.DualHealHint: Heal both normal health and nonlethal.

Changelog.Title: Changelog
Changelog.DontShowAgain: Don't show changelog after system updates

PartyRest.Title: Party Rest
PartyRest.Rested: Party of {people} has fully rested! {hours} hour(s) passed.

Watches.Label: Watches
Watches.DuoHint:
Two people stand watch simultaneously.
Requires at least 4 people.

ChangeTargetSelector.Title: Select change target
ChangeTargetSelector.InvalidChoice: Choice is not valid for the current actor.

CurrencyTransfer.GMRequired: A GM is required to finish the transfer.

TraitSelector.CustomHint: Add new entries with enter or semicolon (;). Hitting backspace twice when input is empty removes last item.

Help.ValueHint: Must be deterministic with no random elements such as dice rolls.
Help.RollHint: Supports random elements such as dice rolls.
Help.SimpleHint: Supports only numeric terms, with no variables or dice rolls.

Integration.Title: Module Integration
Integration.Label: Configure Integration
Integration.Hint: Alter which modules the system adds special functionality for.
Integration.Reset: Reset Integration configuration to default values.

dice-so-nice.Label: Dice So Nice
dice-so-nice.Info: Triggers DSN where the system obfuscates roll data and groups rolls by context.

drag-ruler.Label: Drag Ruler
drag-ruler.Info: Adds speed provider to Drag Ruler.

babele.Label: Babele
babele.Info: Delays pack data preparation so Babele translations are accounted for.

Performance.Title: Performance Configuration
Performance.Reset: Reset Performance configuration to default values.

reachLimit.Label: Reach highlight limit
reachLimit.Hint: Maximum range in squares reach highlight is drawn. Default is 60 (300 ft). First increment is displayed fully regardless of this setting. Values below 10 disable reach highlight entirely.

Health.Title: Health Configuration
Health.Label: Configure Health
Health.Reset: Health configuration reset to default values. Save to confirm.
Health.Instructions: Health computation for the various types of classes. For reference, Pathfinder Society uses the following configuration for player characters: automatic computation, 0.5 rate, one HD maximized, round up, discrete continuity.
Health.RoundingHint: Health values must be whole numbers. Which way to round them?
Health.ContinuityHint: Health can be computed discretely or continuously.  Discrete health is rounded at each level, meaning creatures will receive a stable amount of health for each hitdie.  Continuous health is rounded after each source of hitdie is evaluated, meaning creatures will receive a fluctuating amount of health for each hitdie.

WoundsAndVigor.Label: Wounds and Vigor
WoundsAndVigor.Hint: Use the Wounds and Vigor optional ruleset for this actor type.

WoundThresholds.Label: Wound thresholds
WoundThresholds.Hint: Use wound threshold optional ruleset for this actor type.
WoundThresholds.VigorConflict: Wound Thresholds has no effect with Wounds & Vigor optional rule also enabled.

Experience.Title: Experience Configuration
Experience.Name: Experience Configuration
Experience.Label: Configure Experience
Experience.Reset: Reset Experience configuration to default values.

Track.Label: Experience Track
Track.Hint: The rate at which characters advance in levels
Track.CustomUsage: Custom experience formula is cumulative. Meaning for example, to mimic PF2 style experience you would simply enter 1000, since every single level requires 1000 experience exactly, while setting it to @level * 1000 would mean every single level requires thousand more than the last. Uses character's normal roll data with added @level for the level to achieve.

Experience.DisableHint: Disables experience tracking features from the system, such as experience bars, level up detection, XP thresholds, etc.
Experience.DistributorHint: Opens the XP distributor on combat end unless Shift is held when the combat's deletion is confirmed

PointBuy.Title: Point Buy Calculator
PointBuy.SetupHint: Point buy calculator is available here only temporarily. You can always access it from the settings tab.
PointBuy.Warning: The point buy calculator will OVERRIDE the character's base ability scores.

ActorSelector.Title: Actor Selector
ActorSelector.NoUnownedActors: You do not have permission to see any actors.
ActorSelector.MinimumPermissionLevel: Minimum required permission level is Limited.

VehicleSave.Title: Select save type
VehicleSave.Message: Select the type of save to make.

Info.NotFunctioning: The system (currently) doesn't use this feature

Troubleshooter.Title: Pathfinder 1e System Troubleshooting
Troubleshooter.Prelude: Here are some things you may do when facing problems.

Steps.Label: Steps
Steps.Help: Check the {link}, found normally near the troubleshooter button.
Steps.Log: Check dev tools console log for errors (F12 [or Option+Command+I on Mac], console tab)
Steps.Modules: Ensure modules are not the cause.
Steps.DisableModules: Launching in safe mode is quick way to disable all modules.
Steps.ModuleSuggest: {link} can alternatively speed up ruling out modules.
Steps.DiscordChannel: {channel} channel is for your Pathfinder 1e needs.
Steps.DiscordHint: The channel pins usually hold any pertinent information.
Steps.Report: Consider {reportlink} as a bug or a feature request.

Actions.Label: Operations
Actions.UnlockPacks: Unlock packs for migration. Locked packs are otherwise ignored.
Actions.Reprocess: Process all documents regardless if they've already been migrated.
Actions.MigrateWorldHint:
Normally migration automatically runs, if there are pertinent migrations pending, whenever PF1 update happens and GM logs in the first time.
Running migration manually may sometimes solve problems, such as with documents imported from unmigrated sources.
Actions.MigrateModulesHint: In case you have modules with compendiums that have not been migrated on their end to be fully compatible with current version.

ActorSheet.Title: Overview of the Actor Sheet
ActorSheet.Description: A quick glance at what a character sheet looks like in the Pathfinder 1e for Foundry and where's everything.

GoToBasicMonsters.Title: Ready-to-use Basic Monsters
GoToBasicMonsters.Content:
Pathfinder 1e comes with some ready-to-use basic monsters.
We'll use one of them in order to review the sheet and how it has been configured.

HighlightStreetMagicianInCompendium.Title: Street Magician
HighlightStreetMagicianInCompendium.Content:
This is one of the most complete NPCs in the compendium.
It has a lot of abilities and features as well as some Spell-like abilities and some magic items with scripts.

HighlightSheet.Title: The sheet
HighlightSheet.Content:
This is the sheet of the NPC.
It seems complicated at first glance, but you will understand it soon.

TooltipsWithDefinitions.Title: Data references
TooltipsWithDefinitions.Content: You can hover over any entry in the sheet and a tooltip will be showed listing how to reference the data in formulas (@attributes.hp.max among others by hovering Max HP for example).

RollButtons.Title: Roll buttons
RollButtons.Content:
Keep in mind the icons and .
They are all over the sheet and you can click on them to roll saves, attacks, display defenses, etc...

OtherCommonButtons.Title: Other common buttons
OtherCommonButtons.Content:
Also keep an eye for the following buttons, since they all share common item (race, class, weapon, feat, class ability...) functionality across the sheet. If you are not a GM you won't be able see these icons in this specific sheet.
  • Search for an item in the CompendiumBrowser.
  • Edit an item.
  • Delete an item.
  • Clone the item.
  • Add an item from scratch.

SheetTabs.Title: Sheet tabs
SheetTabs.Content:
The sheet contains many different tabs that store different parts of data.
You can think of them as different sections of the sheet.

DetailsInSheet.Title: Details section
DetailsInSheet.Content:
The summary tab is made up of many different sections.

In this part you'll declare the details such as Gender, Age, etc... as well as the race.
We'll come back to this later.

HdCrAndExperience.Title: Hit Dice, CR and Experience
HdCrAndExperience.Content:
This is only for NPC sheets. For PC sheets it will display instead a experience bar if enabled (as per default).

The hit dice and the experience this NPC gives it's calculated automatically. The hit dice is base on the classes section while the experience in based on the CR.

The GM can manually edit the CR.

RestButton.Title: Rest
RestButton.Content:
The rest button will automatically fill all the charges for the daily abilities and items.
It will also add the hit points for resting based on the hours rested.

Race.Title: Race
Race.Content:
Here's the display of the race.
When the actor doesn't have a race yet you'll be able to select one from the CompendiumBrowser by clicking on or create a custom one by clicking .

Additionally you can edit the race and add the missing bits if needed (such as Human's +2 to any ability score) by clicking on or delete it by clicking on .

HitPointsAndSpeed.Title: Hit Points and Speed
HitPointsAndSpeed.Content: You can manually edit all the inputs in here but Maximum that it's calculated based on the Constitution modifier and the hit dice.

QuickActionsInSummary.Title: Quick Actions and Rolls
QuickActionsInSummary.Content: You can roll from here everything with icon by clicking it, as well as any of the quick actions.

Classes.Title: Classes
Classes.Content:
In the same way as Race you can click on to add a class from the CompendiumBrowser, click on to edit the class or delete it by clicking on .

Whenever a class is added or an existing class is leveled up, a Wizard Level Up dialog will pop up to help you configure the changes.

Additionally you can clone an existing class by clicking on .

AttributesTab.Title: Attributes tab
AttributesTab.Content:
Here's a display of the ability scores and traits.
We call traits to the combination of Senses, Size, Languages, Resistances, Immunities... We'll go over them quickly.

AbilityScoresSection.Title: Ability Scores
AbilityScoresSection.Content:
The ability score Total is editable, as well as Damage, Drain and Penalty.
The modifiers, ACP (Armor Class Penalty) and ASF (Arcane Spell Failure) are automatically calculated.

TraitsSection.Title: Traits
TraitsSection.Content:
Size, Senses, Resistances Immunities... all the entries here are editable by clicking on , directly typing in the input or selecting from a dropdown.

Senses work automatically with Foundry light system except for those that are not supported and marked as such (*).

ResistancesAndImmunitiesDialog.Title: Resistances and Immunities dialog
ResistancesAndImmunitiesDialog.Content: Whenever you are about to apply damage you can use Shift+Click to display your resistances and immunities and reduce damage from such.

CombatTab.Title: Combat tab
CombatTab.Content:
Here you'll find all the shortcuts you might need for an encounter. As you can see the items are grouped by type.

You can edit the entries by clicking on , delete them by clicking on or clone them by clicking on .
Aditionally you can add an item from scratch by clicking on Add.

FilterOptions.Title: Filter options
FilterOptions.Content:
Notice the filter options. These options are used to filter the entries. And they are available in other tabs as well.

Each tab will have filters for its own specific items types.

InventoryTab.Title: Inventory tab
InventoryTab.Content:
Here you'll be able to see all the items you have in your inventory.
Same as with the Combat tab the entries are grouped by type.

You can add items from the CompendiumBrowser by clicking on .
You also have the , , and options.

ItemsDetails.Title: Items details and options
ItemsDetails.Content: You can hover over each of the icons in the group header (, , , , ...) to find more information about what they mean.

FeaturesTab.Title: Feats & Class Abilities tab
FeaturesTab.Content:
Everything related to feats or abilities granted by class, race die or other effects can be found here.

As before, you'll find the filter on top as well as the , , , and options.

You can also hover the icons for information.

Charges.Title: Charges
Charges.Content:
This is the amount of charges an item has (not the amount of uses left; for example 4 remaining Lay on hands don't mean 4 remaining Channel positive energy). Followed by the maximum amount.

You can manually edit the charges by typing in the input or clicking on .

You can also edit charge cost by clicking on .

SkillsTab.Title: Skills tab
SkillsTab.Content:
Here lays all the Pathfinder skills.
If you hover over any of the it will show a icon that will open the compendium entry for the skill.

Additionally you can add custom skills by clicking on Add skill at the bottom of the list.

UnlockSkills.Title: Unlock skills for edit
UnlockSkills.Content:
You can unlock the skills for editing by clicking on .
After that you'll see the icon. You can also lock the skills again by clicking on .

AddSubskill.Title: Add subskill
AddSubskill.Content: You can add a subskill from an skill (such as Alchemy for Craft) by clicking on for the skill.

BuffsTab.Title: Buffs & Conditons tab
BuffsTab.Content:
All the conditions and buffs can be found here.
Once a buff is added you'll see , and options. You can also create one with the and options.

Most of the Pathfinder 1e conditions are displayed above, if not you can search for them in the CompendiumBrowser.

ConditionDuration.Title: Condition duration
ConditionDuration.Content:
As expected you can activate/deactivate the condition by clicking over the icon.

You can also set a duration for the condition by right clicking on them.

SpellsTab.Title: Spells tab
SpellsTab.Content:
If your class is a caster or you have configured Spell-like abilities they will be shown here.
As usual you can find the , , , and options.

SpellbooksTab.Title: Spellbooks
SpellbooksTab.Content: Depending on where do your spells come from or how have you configured the spellbooks you'll see multiple tabs in here. You can switch between them in order to add/modify/delete spells.

SpellbooksConfiguration.Title: Spellbooks configuration
SpellbooksConfiguration.Content:
You can configure the spellbooks here by clicking on the icon. Here you'll be able to tweak at need the many options of the spellbooks.

If your spellbook comes from caster from the CompendiumBrowser it's already configured except for some minor tweaks (such as extra spells for Sorcerer).

BiographyTab.Title: Biography tab
BiographyTab.Content:
This is a free text field that you can use to write your character's biography, perks, etc.

The only thing to keep in mind is that the text here is visible to everyone with Limited permission.

NotesTab.Title: Notes tab
NotesTab.Content: Free text field that you can use to write notes about your character such as NPC tactics, backstory (to avoid spoilers), etc.

MagicItemsTable.Title: Magic Items
MagicItemsTable.Content: In here the GM would also be able to see all the magic items of the character, as well as the DC for identifying, school and a shortcut to set them as identified.

SettingsTab.Title: Settings
SettingsTab.Content:
Here you'll be able to configure which abilities to use for specific calculations (for example Charisma instead of Constitution for Undead) as well as the spellbooks.

Additionally you can make use of the Point Buy Calculator at any time, not only on character creation.

Errors.NoItemInMessage: No relevant item found in message.

DisableLLV.Label: Disable LLV
DisableLLV.Hint: Prevent Low-light Vision from affecting this light source's radius.

InitTiebreaker.Label: Initiative Tiebreaker
InitTiebreaker.Hint: Append total initiative divided by 100 to break ties in Initiative.

HealthDisplay.Label: Health Floater Permission
HealthDisplay.Hint: Minimum permission level needed to see health-related (hit points, ability damage, negative levels, etc.) floaters on tokens.

Vision.SharingHint: How to handle Shared Vision between players.
Vision.GuaranteedHint: Minimum permission required to always see from a token. Foundry default is Observer.
Vision.PCDefaultHint: Player Characters by default have token vision, regardless of default token setup.
Vision.SystemControlHint: Use creature's vision configuration to determine vision, supporting PF specific concepts such as low-light vision. If disabled, vision is determined in Foundry's token settings alone.
Vision.RequiresSelectionHint: When checked, players who have no token selected will NOT benefit from any of their tokens' low-light vision or darkvision.

VariantRules.BackgroundSkillsHint: Use the Background Skills optional ruleset
VariantRules.FractionalBaseBonusesHint: Use the Fractional Base Bonuses optional ruleset

Token.PCDispositionHint: Override to default token disposition for player characters.
Token.NPCDispositionHint: Override to default token disposition for non-player characters

Canvas.MeasureStyleHint: Whether to use Pathfinder's measurement style instead of FoundryVTT's default style

SETTINGS.HideTokenConditionsH: Whether buffs should hide their icons from token status effects
SETTINGS.CoreEffectsH: Displays only PF1 conditions on tokens (unchecked) or core icons as well (checked)
SETTINGS.UnchainedActionEconomyH: Whether to use the Unchained Action Economy optional ruleset.
SETTINGS.CybertechHint: Enable cybertech features even without cybertech installed, such as displaying implantation capacity.
SETTINGS.CriticalConfirmHint: If disabled, critical confirmation rolls are replaced with Defense DC display, for Armor as DR optional rule.
SETTINGS.SkipActionDialogsH: Skips action prompts (such as those from attacks and saving throws) unless you Shift-click them
SETTINGS.MeasureOnQuickUseHint: Enables the placement of measure templates when skipping the action prompt.
SETTINGS.DualHealDefaultHint: Heal both hit points and nonlethal damage when healing hit points, as per the rule that magic and abilties heal both when normal hit points are healed (and as such resting is not affected).

Sheet.InvertFiltersHint: Inverts shift-click behaviour on type filters in (item) sections.

Houserules.CoinDivisorHint: How many coins weigh 1 lbs. Set to zero (0) to disable coin weight. Default is 50.
Houserules.SpellPointCostHint: Default cost spell point using spells use if not configured per spell.
Houserules.AltReachHint: Hides the outer corners from 10-ft reach measurements
Houserules.NPCProficienciesHint: NPC actors also use proficiencies. With this disabled (default), they are considered proficient with everything they have as per RAW.

Chat.ObscureInlineRollsHint: Hide roll bonuses and details from those without at least observer permission.
Chat.ObscureSaveDCsHint: Hide DC values from chat cards from players.
Chat.AutoCollapseHint: Automatically collapse Item Card descriptions in the Chat Log
Chat.HideButtonsHint: Whether to hide chat card buttons, such as those found on attack rolls.
Chat.NoTargetsHint: Disables targeted actors from showing up on attack cards
Chat.ClearTargetsHint: Whether to untarget everything after an attack roll.

SETTINGS.DragRulerUseElevationName: Use elevation to determine movement type
SETTINGS.DragRulerUseElevationHint: Use a token's elevation to determine whether it is flying or burrowing

Units.SystemHint: System of units to be used in the world
Units.DistanceHint: Override system of units to be used with distances.
Units.WeightHint: Override system of units to be used with weights.

SETTINGS.OverlandVariantL: Variant of how overland speed is calculated with metric distances.
